sentence: Joshua Stein, a philosopher who studies antisemitism, pointed out on Twitter that two representatives in the caucus are Christians from Pennsylvania, Dan Meuser and Brian Fitzpatrick.
author: Noah Berlatsky
title: A Christian-led caucus 'protecting' Jewish values? No thanks.

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Lawmakers Push Pelosi, McCarthy on Stock Trading Ban

sentence: Initially helmed by late family patriarch and former accountant Gerard Basquiat, the artist’s sisters have co-administrated the Basquiat estate with their stepmother, Nora Fitzpatrick, since 2013.
author: Maiysha Kai
title: Basquiat’s life takes focus in new exhibition curated by his sisters
